message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 3-5-1, translated into all languages

data.en: Countries are encouraged to conduct general population surveys on substance use regularly, but at least every four-five years. Also, countries are encouraged to use less costly alternatives to estimate the number of people with substance use disorders and service utilization, taking advantage of the availability of administrative data through the use of indirect estimation methods. Collection of data from countries is planned on annual or biannual basis.
